text.text_translated: Today, a lot of business happens between different countries. Many business people speak English. But the way people talk for business is different in each country. If you do not understand these differences, this can cause problems. You can think wrong things about people. And you can have problems understanding them. Etiquette means the polite rules for how to act with other people. Business etiquette is about these rules for work. Here are three simple things about business etiquette around the world. This information can help you work with people from different countries.

feedback.feedback: The text is a perfect example of A2 writing. Vocabulary is strictly A1/A2. The keyword 'etiquette' is defined simply and effectively. Sentence structures are simple and clear. Factual accuracy is maintained. No errors.
